name: cascade-test
description: A test framework where context cascades through your test hierarchy. Built with TypeScript for type safety and plain JavaScript objects with automatic context passing.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/bin/run-tests.js dist/test/integration
scripts.test:dev: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/bin/run-tests.js dist/test/integration
scripts.test:fixtures: npm run build && node dist/bin/run-tests.js dist/test/integration
scripts.test:reporters: npm run build && node dist/bin/run-tests.js --regex='reporter-' dist/test/integration
scripts.test:examples: npm run build && node dist/bin/run-tests.js dist/test/examples
scripts.test:examples-mocha-json: npm run build && node dist/bin/run-tests.js --reporter=mocha-json --output=mocha-results.json dist/test/examples
scripts.test:examples-junit: npm run build && node dist/bin/run-tests.js --reporter=junit --output=test-results.xml dist/test/examples
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build && node dist/bin/run-tests.js dist/test/examples --coverage
scripts.test:coverage:html: npm run build && node dist/bin/run-tests.js dist/test/examples --coverage --coverage-reporter html
scripts.test:coverage:lcov: npm run build && node dist/bin/run-tests.js dist/test/examples --coverage --coverage-reporter lcov
scripts.test:coverage:ci: npm run build && node dist/bin/run-tests.js dist/test/integration --coverage --coverage-reporter text --coverage-reporter lcov
